edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.core.io

Class LineIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.illinois.cs.cogcomp.core.io.LineIO

  • public class LineIO
extends Object
    A container for utility functions that perform line-by-line reading and writing of files.
    Author:
    Vivek Srikumar, upadhya3

      • slurp

        public static String slurp(String fileName)
                    throws FileNotFoundException
        Read the contents of a file using the default charset and return as a single string
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • read

        public static <T> ArrayList<T> read(String fileName,
                                    String charsetName,
                                    ITransformer<String,T> transformer)
                             throws FileNotFoundException
        This function reads a file line-by-line and converts each line into an object using a transformer that is passed as a parameter. This passes a FileInputStream created with fileName into read(java.io.InputStream, String, ITransformer) .
        Type Parameters:
        T - Each line of the file represents an object of type T
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        transformer - A transformer from String to type T
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing objects of type T, with one object corresponding to each line.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • read

        public static <T> ArrayList<T> read(InputStream fileStream,
                                    String charsetName,
                                    ITransformer<String,T> transformer)
                             throws FileNotFoundException
        This function reads an InputStream line-by-line and converts each line into an object using a transformer that is passed as a parameter.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing objects of type T, with one object corresponding to each line.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • readGZip

        public static <T> ArrayList<T> readGZip(String fileName,
                                        ITransformer<String,T> transformer)
                                 throws IOException
        This function reads a gzipped file line-by-line and converts each line into an object using a transformer that is passed as a parameter.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Each line of the file represents an object of type T
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        transformer - A transformer from String to type T
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing objects of type T, with one object corresponding to each line.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        public static ArrayList<String> read(String fileName,
                                     String charsetName)
                              throws FileNotFoundException
        An implementation of read(String, Transformer<String, T>). This function reads the lines in a file and returns them.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        An arraylist of the lines of the file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • readGZip

        public static ArrayList<String> readGZip(String fileName)
                                  throws IOException
        An implementation of readGZip(String, Transformer<String, T>). This function reads the lines in a gzipped file and returns them.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        An arraylist of the lines of the file.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • read

        @AvoidUsing(reason="Cannot be used for accessing files inside jars in the classpath",
            alternative="readFromClasspath(String fileName)")
public static ArrayList<String> read(String fileName)
                                                                                                                                                                                  throws FileNotFoundException
        An implementation of read(String, Transformer<String, T>). This function reads the lines in a file and returns them.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        An arraylist of the lines of the file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • readFromClasspath

        public static ArrayList<String> readFromClasspath(String fileName)
                                           throws FileNotFoundException
        This searches for the file on the classpath before reading it. If it doesn't find the file, it throws a FileNotFoundException.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        An arraylist of the lines of the file.
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException

      • write

        public static <T> void write(String fileName,
                             Iterable<T> list,
                             ITransformer<T,String> transformer)
                      throws IOException
        This function writes a list of objects into a file, one per line. Each object is transformed into a string using a transformer.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeGZip

        public static <T> void writeGZip(String fileName,
                                 Iterable<T> list,
                                 ITransformer<T,String> transformer)
                          throws IOException
        This function writes a list of objects into a Gzipped file, one per line. Each object is transformed into a string using a transformer.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Each line of the file represents an object of type T
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file to be read
        transformer - A transformer from String to type T
        Throws:
        IOException
